fr.escape.game.entity

Interface Collisionable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Bonus, Boss, Entity, Ship, Shot
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBonus, AbstractBoss, AbstractShip, AbstractShot, BlackHoleShot, EarthShot, FireBallShot, JupiterShot, MissileShot, MoonShot, ShiboleetShot

    public interface Collisionable

    An interface for Entity which can collide which another Entity.

    Call by CollisionDetector.

    • Method Detail

      • collision

        void collision(User user,
             int whoami,
             Entity e,
             int whois)
        A collision between Entity has been detected and need to be handle.
        Parameters:
        user - User User for Highscore and Life.
        whoami - Entity type.
        e - Entity which collide.
        whois - Entity type which collide.
